definitions.definition: used when the two numbers or amounts mentioned are being added together

examples.text: The cost is £22, plus £1 for postage.
Membership is 350 dollars per year plus tax.

definitions.definition: as well as something/somebody; and also

examples.text: We have to fit five of us plus all our gear in the car.

definitions.definition: used when the number mentioned may actually be more or less by a particular amount

examples.text: The margin of error was plus or minus three percentage points.
